pr_title: add option to write complete logfile (fix #8777)

timeline.message: add option to write complete logfile (fix #8777)

timeline.bodyText: Shouln`t we add info and warning for c:geo as well?
timeline.author: Lineflyer

replies.bodyText:
The fullInfo does not exclude anything, the manual logs have the prefix "cgeo", and the system-written messages for c:geo have the package name as prefix (which is "cgeo.geocachin"), so everything c:geo related should be included.
Or have you found log messages prefixed by "c:geo" anywhwere?
replies.author: moving-bits

replies.bodyText: I probably misunderstood you - you're not talking about the prefix but about the log level?
replies.author: moving-bits

replies.bodyText: Exactly, I would suggest to add level warning and info for the c:geo package name to the normal logging.
replies.author: Lineflyer

replies.bodyText: Added info/warning for package related logcat messages
replies.author: moving-bits

timeline.message: set minimum logcat level for package to info
